summary: Allows you to improve official dragonbone weapons beyond epic.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
If you have any mods that altered the smithing perk tree, you might have noticed that you can\'t improve dragonbone weapons (Those added with Dawnguard DLC) very much. This pseudo-fix basically reverts the Dragon smithing perk back to Dawnguard default so you can improve dragon weapons twice as much.

Note:
This isn\'t a bug by Bethesda (hence pseudo-fix), it\'s a problem introduced by modders altering the smithing perk tree prior to the Dawnguard DLC being released.

Installation:
Merely ensure the esp is at the bottom of your load order. You will need the Dawnguad DLC.
This will revert the Dragon smithing perk back to Dawnguard default.

Conflicts;
This WILL conflict with any mod that alters the smithing perk tree.
I believe \"Smithing Perks Overhaul\" and \"No Perk Prereqs\" will conflict.

Fun fact:
This fix was so simple it took me longer to get the creation-kit working with Dawnguard than fixing the perk. I merely added a random space into the perk description.

For modders/people who want to fix their/others mods:
Just make the DragonArmor perk under Perk be the same as the Dawnguard version.
More specifically you need to add the keyword \"DLC1WeapMaterialDragonbone\" to the perk entry conditions.
You still need permission from the original mod makers if you want to upload the fix.

Permissions:
Do whatever you want with this. Most likely though since this is a stupid/simple fix, you\'d want to implement this yourself in the CK. In which case you don\'t have to credit me.
